resources.string: This is the settings menu, here you can change the difficulty of the words, by difficulty we mean the length of the word between one of 3 choices Easy, Medium, or Hard. The number represents the number of letters in the word to be displayed.

Description of app goes here, to access the settings menu, return back to the home screen and press the Menu button, from here you can choose to set the settings which includes difficulty level, if you choose performance, here you can view your child\'s current scores which includes how many words correct/incorrect and the percentage correct, also if you would like to clear the data you can by taping the Reset button.

This is an application to better learn spelling, you will be presented with a word with missing letter/s, you will be presented with a short list of letters, put the correct letter/s into the text field in order from left to right and hit the button that says GO.
